name: Range Detective
description:
Range Detective Story:

Tom, a retired gun for hire on his way home is interrupted by an outburst of bandits. He must find his way home by foot after the trains have all been overtaken while under constant threat by the gang of bandits as well as the law of the sheriff.

Description:

Range detective is a top down shooter requiring fast reflexes and quick aiming. A variety of enemies and a fast increase in difficulty creates a challenging and fun shooter.

To play use the wasd keys to control your cowboy and use the mouse to aim and shoot your six shooter at the bandits. Destroy all the barrels that the bandits are hiding in to stop them from appearing and collect all the golden nuggets to progress onto the next level making sure to avoid the all nasty cacti that get in the way as well as provide a painful prick to the player. Kill all bandits and barrels as possible to gain as many point as possible to get a chance at reaching the top score. 

Controls: 

W A S D - movement

Mouse - look/aim

left click - shoot

R - reload

Features:

5 Unique Levels

Variety of Enemies

Environmental hazards

Scoring system

Great music

Age rating:

16+
